description:
Add a pocket that fits a smartphone and passport. This bag has multiple carrying options, and caters to your environment or your day's activities.

  • 210-denier recycled nylon has a water-resistant coating
  • Removable shoulder strap has various attachment points
  • Back loop attaches to a belt or waist strap
  • Zippered front pocket and interior mesh pocket
name: Fjallraven High Coast Pocket - Unisex
